descriptions: Student cannot identify any national symbols or icons.
Student can identify one national symbol or icon with prompting.
Student can identify two national symbols or icons with some prompting.
Student can identify three national symbols or icons with minimal prompting.
Student can independently identify at least four national symbols or icons.
Student can independently and accurately identify several national symbols and icons and provide context for their importance.
Student demonstrates no understanding of the significance or meaning behind any national symbol.
Student demonstrates a basic understanding of the significance of at least one national symbol.
Student demonstrates a limited understanding of the significance of at least two national symbols.
Student adequately explains the significance of multiple national symbols with minimal prompting.
Student clearly and accurately explains the significance of multiple national symbols and icons.
Student provides detailed explanations of the historical, cultural, and political significance of multiple national symbols and icons, demonstrating a comprehensive understanding.
Student cannot identify any state symbols or icons.
Student can identify one state symbol or icon with prompting.
Student can identify two state symbols or icons with some prompting.
Student can identify three state symbols or icons with minimal prompting.
Student can independently identify at least four state symbols or icons.
Student can independently and accurately identify several state symbols and icons and provide context for their importance.
Student demonstrates no understanding of the significance or meaning behind any state symbol.
Student demonstrates a basic understanding of the significance of at least one state symbol.
Student demonstrates a limited understanding of the significance of at least two state symbols.
Student adequately explains the significance of multiple state symbols with minimal prompting.
Student clearly and accurately explains the significance of multiple state symbols and icons.
Student provides detailed explanations of the historical, cultural, and political significance of multiple state symbols and icons, demonstrating a comprehensive understanding.
